content: LONDON The AXA UK Group Pension Scheme said on Monday that it has agreed a 2.8 billion pound ($4.4 billion) longevity swap deal with Reinsurance Group of America.

content: LONDON  July 13 The AXA UK Group Pension Scheme said on Monday that it has agreed a 2.8 billion pound ($4.4 billion) longevity swap deal with Reinsurance Group of America.
